sentences.english: By analyzing, this paper expounds its concrete application in Soil and Water Conservaˉtion research.
sentences.chinese: 通過分析，引入它在水土保持研究中的具體應用。

sentences.english: Economical woodlands have a positive effect on soil conservation in red soil.
sentences.chinese: 經濟林地和草地則起到了很好的水土保持措施作用。

sentences.english: Trees play an important part in water and soil conservation.
sentences.chinese: 樹木在水土保持發揮的一個重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Further strengthening soil-water conservation in upstream area of the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 要進一步加強上游地區的水土保持工作。

sentences.english: The synthetical benefits of soil and water conservation after harness in …
sentences.chinese: 綜合評價了石馬河小流域治理後的水土保持效益。

sentences.english: Engineering measures of SWC on the hillslope can improve soil water content.
sentences.chinese: 水土保持坡面工程措施能有效地提高土壤含水率。

sentences.english: Proper soil and water conservation measures are a prerequisite for building on mountainsides .
sentences.chinese: 在山坡地建屋，必須先做好水土保持。

sentences.english: The monitoring method of water and soil conservation measure should adopt the remote sensing monitoring in the more and coarser sediment area.
sentences.chinese: 多沙粗沙區水土保持措施監測應採用遙感監測方法。

sentences.english: Ruzi grass is a new variety, which is suitable for growing in the south of China for soil and water conservation.
sentences.chinese: 乳汁草是一種新的適於我國南方生長的水土保持草種。

sentences.english: Ecological restoration is the development of eco-construction of soil and water conservation.
sentences.chinese: 生態修復是水土保持生態建設的深化和發展。

sentences.english: Relying on the village soil and water conservation projects, the grapes have been planting with a great success.
sentences.chinese: 九里村依託水土保持工程，示範種植葡萄取得了成功。

sentences.english: The concept and establishing principle of eco-agriculture with soil and water conservation have been briefly narrated.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了水土保持型生態農業的概念和其建設原則。

sentences.english: Describes the function of soil and water conservation of Populus davidiana forest.
sentences.chinese: 分析了山楊林的水土保持作用。

sentences.english: On the other hand, we should enhance our awareness that forest resources are very vital to us.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，我們還應當增強水土保持的意識。

sentences.english: Indicated above are pictures that show trees play a vital role in water and soil conservation.
sentences.chinese: 如圖所示，樹木對水土保持起着至關重要的作用。

sentences.english: Dazhou Soil and Water Conservation Office.
sentences.chinese: 達州市水土保持辦公室。

definition: to make green with plants/to reforest/(Internet slang) Islamization
Green Wall of China, a massive afforestation program on the eastern margin of the Gobi Desert aimed at stopping the desert's expansion, started in 1978 and planned to be completed by 2050
